name: Lost in Dimension
description:
Stuck in alternate dimensions… although Cassie and Casey can’t see each other, they can sense an otherworldly presence. Cassie begins the adventure in her family estate: familiar, yet with an eerie feeling as of late. Casey is in a parallel version of it and not quite sure how he got there. His interaction with the world is entirely text based. Neither has a complete picture of their environment and not everything is as it seems: they must communicate and work together to solve puzzles around them.

Will you help Cassie and Casey on this unique parallel journey and uncover secrets of the past, present, and maybe even the future?
